languages.text: "Уймись, мерзавец!" {n}Священник в простом черном облачении проходит сквозь толпу, как боевой корабль, взрезающий небо.{/n} "Ты вздумал кого-то судить? Это откуда же в тебе столько спеси, что ты возомнил, будто вправе на такое?!"

traits.locale_text: "Уймись, мерзавец!" {n}Священник с посохом в простом черном облачении проходит сквозь толпу, как боевой корабль, взрезающий небо.{/n} "Ты вздумал кого-то судить? Это откуда же в тебе столько спеси, что ты возомнил, будто вправе на такое?!"

languages.text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"
languages.original_text: "Уймись, мерзавец!" {n}Священник в простом черном облачении проходит сквозь толпу, как боевой корабль, взрезающий небо.{/n} "Ты вздумал кого-то судить? Это откуда же в тебе столько спеси, что ты возомнил, будто вправе на такое?!"

traits.locale_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment and wielding a staff, cuts through the crowd like a battleship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgment on others? How conceited must you be to think that you have such right!"

"Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment and wielding a staff, cuts through the crowd like a battleship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgment on others? How conceited must you be to think that you have such right!"

"Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment and wielding a staff, cuts through the crowd like a battleship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgment on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

"Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment and wielding a staff, cuts through the crowd like a battleship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgment on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

"Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

languages.text: 「静まれ、悪党め！」{n}黒いシンプルな衣をまとった司祭の声が、空を渡るヴォイドシップのように群衆を切り裂いた。{/n}「何ゆえ他者をそのように裁く？お前たちにそんな権限があると思うなど、なんと傲慢な心だ！」
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: 「静まれ、悪党め！」{n}黒いシンプルな衣をまとった司祭の声が、空を渡るヴォイドシップのように群衆を切り裂いた。{/n}「何ゆえ他者をそのように裁く？お前たちにそんな権限があると思うなど、なんと傲慢な心だ！」

languages.text: “闭嘴，你这个无赖！”{n}一位穿着朴素黑袍的牧师从人群中穿过，仿佛虚空舰划过天空一般。{/n}“你竟敢评判他人？你竟以为自己有这种权利？这是何等傲慢！”
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴，你这个无赖！”{n}一位穿着朴素黑袍的牧师从人群中穿过，仿佛虚空舰划过天空一般。{/n}“你竟敢评判他人？你竟以为自己有这种权利？这是何等傲慢！”

languages.text: «¡Callaos, sabandijas!». {n}Un sacerdote, vestido con un sencillo atuendo negro, se abre paso entre la multitud como una nave del vacío que surca los cielos.{/n} «¿Cómo os atrevéis a juzgar al prójimo? ¡Vergüenza debería daros creer que eso os corresponde!».
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Callaos, sabandijas!». {n}Un sacerdote, vestido con un sencillo atuendo negro, se abre paso entre la multitud como una nave del vacío que surca los cielos.{/n} «¿Cómo os atrevéis a juzgar al prójimo? ¡Vergüenza debería daros creer que eso os corresponde!».

languages.text: « Taisez-vous, misérable ! » {n}Un prêtre, vêtu d'une modeste tenue noire, traverse la foule tel un vaisseau spatial qui fend les cieux.{/n} « Comment osez-vous juger ainsi votre prochain ? Quelle arrogance de croire que vous en avez le droit ! »
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: « Taisez-vous, misérable ! » {n}Un prêtre, vêtu d'une modeste tenue noire, traverse la foule tel un vaisseau spatial qui fend les cieux.{/n} « Comment osez-vous juger ainsi votre prochain ? Quelle arrogance de croire que vous en avez le droit ! »

languages.text: "Schweigt, Schurke!" {n}Ein Priester in einfachem schwarzem Gewand schiebt sich durch die Menge wie ein Raumschiff über den Himmel.{/n} "Ihr wagt es, andere zu verurteilen? Was für eine Arroganz, dieses Recht zu beanspruchen!"
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt, Schurke!" {n}Ein Priester in einfachem schwarzem Gewand schiebt sich durch die Menge wie ein Raumschiff über den Himmel.{/n} "Ihr wagt es, andere zu verurteilen? Was für eine Arroganz, dieses Recht zu beanspruchen!"

languages.text: "Kes sesini rezil herif!" {n}Sade, karalara bürünmüş bir rahip, göğü aşan bir uçsuz gemisi edasıyla kalabalığı yarıp geçiyor.{/n} "Ne hakla başkalarını yargılarsınız? Ne sanıyorsunuz kendinizi?"
languages.original_text: "Be quiet, you scoundrel!" {n}A priest, clad in a simple black raiment, cuts through the crowd like a voidship crossing the sky.{/n} "You dare pass judgement on others? What arrogance, to think you have the right!"

traits.locale_text: "Kapa çeneni seni serseri!" {n}Basit, siyah bir kıyafet giymiş bir rahip, göğü yaran bir uçsuz gemisi edasıyla kalabalığı yarıp geçiyor.{/n} "Başkalarını yargılama cüretini gösteren de kim? Buna hakkınız olduğunu düşünmek ne de büyük bir kibirdir!"
